captions.text:
Once upon a time in a area far far away not
even near any McDonalds or even a Subway,

there was a tower. And in the Tower lived
Peppa Pig and her evil step-mother Mutti Pig.

Peppa Pig's evil step-mother trapped her inside
the tower and forced her everyday to brush

her hair and even after brushing her step-Mothers
hair she even had to brush her teeth. Yup

her step-mother was super lazy. The tower
had some major dust problems and so everyday,

Peppa had to dust the entire tower, luckily
it wasn't that big. The most unpleasant chore

was the daily foot rubs Peppa had to give
Mutti Pig and her step mothers feet stick.

Peppa wished her nosed wasn't so big and sensitive.
Peppa wished so bad that she could leave the

tower. And every night she dream of a life
outside. She dreamed about being royalty she

wanted to be a princess to be a princess so
bad and have her own stage coach and crown

she wished that she could live in a humongous
castle, but in the morning she awoke to it

being just a dream. She was still stuck in
the tower with her evil step-mother. The next

night Peppa looked out her window and saw
a shooting star. Se wished that she could

become a princess. In the morning she woke
up as a normal pig, she did all her chores

as usual with the hair brushing and teeth
brushing. Dusting and the nasty foot rub.

The Mutti Pig came to Peppa Pig and told her
she had to leave the tower, we are out of

bacon and had to go to the store. Peppa Pig
that it was a little strange that Mutti Pig

would go and buy bacon because should pigs
really eat bacon. Either way that's what he

step mother wanted and so she left the tower
and went into town. Peppa Pig went back to

doing her chores and today Peppa had a new
chore, organizing the toothpaste. But she

heard something from the bottom of the tower.
What on earth could that noise be she thought.

And down at the base of the tower she found
a royal knight, a horse and a carriage just

like her dream. The Royal knight told Peppa
that he was her long lost brother and he had

been searching for years to find her. Peppa
was so excited she always wanted a brother.

Her brother asked Peppa if she has super long
hair she could let down and she could use

a latter to get down to him. peppa shock her
head no she didn't have any hair at all, what

was she going to do. But wait she has a great
idea she can kick down the tubes of toothpaste

then jump on them and they would soften her
fall. One two three jump. Whoops Peppa totally

missed the pile of toothpaste but she was
actually fine. She the tower wasn't actually

that high up in the first place she could
have probably jumped down years ago. Peppa's

brother was so excited to see her that he
gave her a big hug. He then had her go in

the carriage and took her off to the kingdom.
Everyone who was anyone was waiting at the

castle for Peppa Pig's arrival, Peppa's brother
told her to enter the secret dressing room

where she will magically be transformed into
a princess. She entered a commoner and exited

a princess life went pretty fast after that,
she fell in love with a dog. They had a royal

wedding. and they lived happily ever after.
Oh oh whoops everyone lived happily ever after

except Daddy Pig he just got ran over by the
carriage. Ouch. If you liked this video please

click like and subscribe also in the comments
let me know what other Peppa Pig adventure

you would like to see.Click on a picture to
watch another fun toy video. Thanks for watching
and have a great day!

title: Peppa Pig Princess Castle SHOPKINS George Pig Cinderella Zoe Zebra Play-Doh Mutti Pig DisneyCarToys
